mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, HANDLE_SEQ_NO AS handleSeqNo, HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO AS handleEmpTelno, HANDLE_DESC AS handleDesc, HANDLE_STATUS AS handleStatus FROM ATMS_01001240

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, HANDLE_SEQ_NO AS handleSeqNo, HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO AS handleEmpTelno, HANDLE_DESC AS handleDesc, HANDLE_STATUS AS handleStatus FROM ATMS_01001240 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}, HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001240 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}, HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_01001240 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, HANDLE_EMP_NAME = #{handleEmpName}, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO = #{handleEmpTelno}, HANDLE_DESC = #{handleDesc}, HANDLE_STATUS = #{handleStatus} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}, HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001240 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, HANDLE_SEQ_NO, HANDLE_DATETIME, HANDLE_EMP_NAME, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO, HANDLE_DESC, HANDLE_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{handleSeqNo}, #{handleDatetime}, #{handleEmpName}, #{handleEmpTelno}, #{handleDesc}, #{handleStatus} )
